title: Mexico Oceanfront Resort Luxury near Cancún with Infinity Pool & Beach Club
description: Hugging the idyllic coastline of the Caribbean Sea on the Riviera Maya near Cancún and Playa del Carman, The Fives Oceanfront - Puerto Morelos is the ultimate hideaway with stunning ocean views. Take a refreshing plunge into the gleaming infinity pool that overlooks the turquoise water or walk along the beachfront before being wined and dined across four restaurants. Allow the soothing waves to be the soundtrack of your evening of lounging at the private, adults-only beach club. When it’s time to unleash your inner explorer, you can experience some of the world's best diving and swimming - all within a 20-minute drive of Cancún International Airport.
offer_address: Av. Javier Rojo Gomez Nte. SM-02 MZ-25 LOTE-01 Centro, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Q.R., Mexico
